title: Watched 3 entire esport lol games but they didn't count towards reward
body: I watched 3 entire games on lol.esport but the counter is still on 0/2. How's that?

replies.body: same for me, i watched some games and nothing i'm still 0/2

When i first started watching it even told me "rewards are active and linked to your account" (or smt like that, I'm italian).

It even says on the same page "game watched: 2, hours spent watching: 1". And I watched the game only today cause Fanatic was on.
